title: INtopBackup

items.title: The hidden costs of cutting Medicaid
items.description: Cutting Medicaid can seem like an easy way to slash the budget. But, the costs can spread to all of us.

items.title: Why lung cancer is a 'hidden epidemic' in this part of the world
items.description: Rates of the world's deadliest cancer appear to be low in sub-Saharan Africa. But that statistic is masking the scope of the disease, doctors say.

items.title: Dozens killed in attack on Sudan camp for people who had fled war
items.description: An aid group in Abu Shouk camp says at least 40 were killed by gunmen from the Rapid Support Forces.

items.title: Madonna urges Pope to visit Gaza 'before it's too late'
items.description: The US pop star says the pontiff is "the only one of us who cannot be denied entry".

items.title: Wisconsin woman found guilty 6 years after failed assassination in U.K.
items.description: Aimee Betro covered her face in a niqab as she climbed out of a car in 2019 and tried to shoot a man at point-blank range, prosecutors said.

items.title: Israel bombards Gaza City as UK and allies demand action against 'unfolding famine'

items.title: US and China extend trade truce to avoid tariffs hike
items.description: The US will hold its levy on Chinese imports at 30%, while China will keep a 10% tariff on American goods.
